name: Click & Clunk
description:
4 AM Club presents: Click & Clunk !

You play as two curious beans: Click and Clunk. After hearing stories of unfound treasure deep within the cave, they wander in and end up getting trapped in by a cave collaspe! Work together with your buddy to clear the perilous mysteries of the cave in order to find a way out!

JustinaY: Programmer, Level Design, Environment

pumibless: Character Design, Level Design, Sound

_ _ _

Controls

Click: A small orange bean with a big mining helmet used to stun monsters

  • Keyboard directional keys
  • Right Shift

Clunk: A big purple bean with BULGING  arms, allowing him to throw things like rocks.

  • Keyboard WASD keys
  • Left Shift and E

_ _ _

<<Click the link below to check out our "Soundtrack"! (the music belonging to the original creators of course)>>
